analysis.description:
MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#128) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#225-261)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#341-363)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#434-449)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#453-472)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#534-538) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#275-292):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#289-291)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#291)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#565-578) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#577)

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#501-502) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#543-546)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#534-538)
	- /unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#537-538
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#99)
TokenController.proxyPayment (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#51-53) should be declared external
TokenController.onTransfer (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#59-61) should be declared external
TokenController.onApprove (/unique_chucks/1/0x107c4504cd79c5d2696ea0030a8dd4e92601b82e.sol#67-72) should be declared external
